summary: Provides unit tests for the datapusher submit helper, checking that submissions are not duplicated, are correctly triggered when dataset or resource fields change, respect ongoing jobs, react to modifications in uploads or URLs, and follow the expected task status transitions.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the datapusher integration within CKAN, ensuring that data upload tasks are managed properly and that the system behaves predictably under various state changes.
